info.name: JMOCD V3 (Pokemon Showdown)
info.description:
The latest and greatest of the stylesheets I've made for PS.

Other Info:
Background: https://www.deviantart.com/ishmam/art/Shiny-Mega-Rayquaza-Dragon-Pulse-578899492
Some Battle Stuff Adapted From: https://33kk.github.io/uso-archive/?style=186996 (the swsh backgrounds are also from it) and https://uso.kkx.one/style/135046
Weathers From: https://play.pokemonshowdown.com/fx/ (the gifs themselves are from some other styles though and I would mention them if I remembered them) and http://freestyler.ws/style/122539/pok-mon-showdown-oras-theme-bidoofscrazyvideos and https://33kk.github.io/uso-archive/?style=186996
The "Grey Grid" background is from http://freestyler.ws/style/98094/dundealstylish-smoking-black
The SPL  background is from http://play.pokemonshowdown.com/fx/
The "Forest Lane" and SPL backgrounds look better when the top margin is set to -25px
info.additionalInfo:
Cool Features:
Both light mode AND dark mode work with this (they're both different too)
Bigger battle space
Better looking battle background
Opponent's ELO shows up without having to hover over their avatar
Scrollbars look cooler
Weathers look better
Separating lines in battle chat
Tournament boxes will no longer get in the way of a collapsable userlist
Room tabs are smaller so more can fit
A bunch of style settings

I would explain what each style setting does but I'm too lazy. Also I've already typed a ton of stuff.

Edits:
Edit 1: Added some more textboxes to be styled, and added the first 3 style settings.
Edit 2: Added 3 more style settings; many more are to come.
Edit 3: Added 5 more style settings; one more left (probably).
Edit 4: Added 2 more style settings.
Edit 5: Slightly changed some of the buttons in dark mode.
Edit 6: Fixed some move buttons and the HP text in the battle controls area.
Edit 7: Changed the text color of the "Rated battle" text.
Edit 7: Added a transparent option for the dark and light backgrounds.
Edit 8: Changed the dimensions of the battle background so it wouldn't get messed up when a mon uses earthquake, and also changed the background of the tournament boxes.
Edit 9: Made some more stuff affected by the lighter text setting.
Edit 10: Fixed some stuff with the "Undo Delete" button.
Edit 11: Fixed some stuff with the link when using /dt on a berry or item in a chatroom.
Edit 12: Did the same as above.
Edit 13: Made a little bit more text get affected by the text color style setting.
Edit 14: Made some changes to spoilers.
Edit 15: Made some changes to the background of unread news entries (also yes I made a ton of edits today).
Edit 16: Fixed some stuff with the "Join chat" button in the chat.
Edit 17: Changed the "Choose name" button at the top.
Edit 18: Made minor changes to the form/sprite changing button, the eye icon button in the login popup, and textboxes.
Edit 19: Added a font customization style setting. It doesn't affect the entire website though.
Edit 20: Fixed something where some fonts would mess up the spacing line in the battle log/chat
Edit 21: Fixed the move name link when using /dt on a move.
Edit 22: Changed the position of the trainers in order to better fit them in Free-For-All Random Battles. Also added a style setting that allows you to change the position of the trainers in battles. Finally, edited the battle background style setting so there are multiple different colors of the SPL background.
Edit 23: Fixed the left side trainers being switched in Free-For-All Random Battles.
Edit 24: Fixed the battle background's top margin being more than intended (go into the code and ctrl+f ".backdrop" to find it if you want to change it).
Edit 25: Slightly changed the stat/name/detail/move boxes in the teambuilder for light mode.
Edit 26: Made the username buttons in userlists in light mode actually look good (maybe).
Edit 27: Tweaked the username buttons in the userlist.
Edit 28: Tweaked the filter and illegal markers in the teambuilder, and also fixed the text that turns red when you make EVs that are illegal.
Edit 29: Fixed the teams and boxs being the wrong background in the teambuilder.
Edit 30: Fixed the corners of the folder tabs being messed up.
Edit 31: Fixed the borders' colors in the gender/level/happiness setting box. It can also actually fit the thing where you set whether or not the mon is in its G-Max form. However the text is kinda small.
Edit 32: Made the some more links get affected, like when you switch your avatar into a hidden one by using /avatar and the artist's name link appears.
Edit 33: Made it so you can properly customize the name icon and battle background using style settings.
Edit 34: Made some more changes to spoilers.
Edit 35: Made some changes to the "Resume"/"Play" buttons that appear when you pause a game. This was because the ones in light mode ended up looking weird.
Edit 36: Fixed statuses not being affected by the text color style setting.
Edit 37: Edited some buttons in battles.
Edit 38: Styled the undo button that appears in the PM box when you send a friend request. Also cleaned up the CSS for text and links.
Edit 39: Fixed the offline status text not being red.
Edit 40: Fixed the username having a background.

settings.label: Dark Mode Lighter Text Color (also used for highlights on some buttons)
Light Mode Lighter Text Color (also used for shading on buttons)
